definition: having a rhythm consisting of a dactyl followed by a spondee or a trochee, a verse line with a dactyl followed by a spondee or trochee
details:
adjective
- having a rhythm consisting of a dactyl followed by a spondee or a trochee
= example: having a rhythm consisting of a dactyl followed by a spondee or a trochee
- or relating to or like Adonis
noun
- a verse line with a dactyl followed by a spondee or trochee
= synonyms: Adonic line
